word: Praise the Lord, Oh, my soul, praise His holy name. We may overcome through the blood of the Lamb and the word of our testimony lifting up the Man of example, giving to the world a living example of a Christlike life and [showing] that man may overcome "by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony" (Revelation 12:11). Thus men are left without excuse, for [those who overcame] lived the example that the Lord had given them.-- Letter 25, 1904, pp. 5,6. [To Brothers and Sisters in the Southern Union Conference, January 12, 1904. Andrews University interlined copy.]
